variable.name: BASS_Init
variable.type: function(device: Integer; freq: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal; win: HWND; clsid: PGUID): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_Set3DFactors
variable.type: function(distf: Single; rollf: Single; doppf: Single): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_Get3DFactors
variable.type: function(distf: Single; rollf: Single; doppf: Single): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_Set3DPosition
variable.type: function(Pos: BASS_3DVECTOR; vel: BASS_3DVECTOR; front: BASS_3DVECTOR; top: BASS_3DVECTOR): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_Get3DPosition
variable.type: function(Pos: BASS_3DVECTOR; vel: BASS_3DVECTOR; front: BASS_3DVECTOR; top: BASS_3DVECTOR): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_SetEAXParameters
variable.type: function(env: Integer; vol: Single; decay: Single; damp: Single): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_GetEAXParameters
variable.type: function(env: Cardinal; vol: Single; decay: Single; damp: Single): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_MusicLoad
variable.type: function(mem: LongBool; f: Pointer; offset: Cardinal; Length: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal; freq: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_MusicSetAttribute
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; attrib: Cardinal; value: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_SampleLoad
variable.type: function(mem: LongBool; f: Pointer; offset: Cardinal; Length: Cardinal; Max: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_SampleCreate
variable.type: function(Length: Cardinal; freq: Cardinal; chans: Cardinal; Max: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal): Pointer;

variable.name: BASS_StreamCreate
variable.type: function(freq: Cardinal; chans: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal; proc: Pointer; user: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_StreamCreateFile
variable.type: function(mem: LongBool; f: Pointer; offset: Cardinal; Length: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_StreamCreateURL
variable.type: function(url: PWideChar; offset: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal; proc: DOWNLOADPROC; user: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_StreamCreateFileUser
variable.type: function(buffered: LongBool; flags: Cardinal; proc: STREAMFILEPROC; user: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_RecordStart
variable.type: function(freq: Cardinal; chans: Cardinal; flags: Cardinal; proc: RECORDPROC; user: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelSetAttributes
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; freq: Integer; volume: Integer; pan: Integer): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelGetAttributes
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; freq: Cardinal; volume: Cardinal; pan: Integer): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelSlideAttributes
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; freq: Integer; volume: Integer; pan: Integer; Time: Cardinal): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelSet3DAttributes
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; mode: Integer; Min: Single; Max: Single; iangle: Integer; oangle: Integer; outvol: Integer): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelGet3DAttributes
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; mode: Cardinal; Min: Single; Max: Single; iangle: Cardinal; oangle: Cardinal; outvol: Cardinal): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelSet3DPosition
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; Pos: BASS_3DVECTOR; orient: BASS_3DVECTOR; vel: BASS_3DVECTOR): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelGet3DPosition
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; Pos: BASS_3DVECTOR; orient: BASS_3DVECTOR; vel: BASS_3DVECTOR): LongBool;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelGetData
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; buffer: Pointer; Length: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelSetSync
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; stype: Cardinal; param: Int64; proc: SYNCPROC; user: Cardinal): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelSetDSP
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; proc: DSPPROC; user: Cardinal; priority: Integer): Cardinal;

variable.name: BASS_ChannelSetFX
variable.type: function(handle: Cardinal; etype: Cardinal; priority: Integer): Cardinal;
